What have we gone through? The CNBC pump phase. First was LTC Charlie Lee interview, then Ver interview with BCH on Coinbase launch, then gushing all over XRP the last few weeks. Awareness stage has rewarded figurehead coins. But no change to historical ratios, just coiled $BTC.
You still love Ripple? You still love Litecoin? 😂

There's nothing wrong with Bitcoin. Compared to main competitors (ETH, LTC, BCH, XRP) it is COMPLETELY within historical ratio norms (now heavily favouring $BTC reversion to mean, except ETH). Also, during highest tx fee periods it correlated with highest returns. No more FUD!
